jobDescription: EY Technology Consulting seeks to solve clients' most challenging issues using key technologies.  The role involves transforming businesses, navigating technology trends, and working with leading client organizations.  Opportunities for development, growth, and global mobility are offered.
requiredSkills: Broad consulting and project management skills
Effective problem-solving, conceptual thinking, quantitative and analytical skills
preferredQualifications: Strong oral and written communication, facilitation, relationship-building, and presentation skills
